lead_paragraph: Since filing for bankruptcy protection in July, the former Met and Phillie Lenny Dykstra has been trying to come up with the money to repay loans.
snippet: Since filing for bankruptcy protection in July, the former Met and Phillie Lenny Dykstra has been trying to come up with the money to repay loans.
